posts.message:
so guys do you've an idea which is better: ajax long polling or using web sockets when implementing a notification system?! 

if we're talking about a server with good infrastructure does it matter to migrate from ajax to websockets?! 
does it has a problem with big data apps?! 
does it has an effect on mobile browsers?! 
im a little bit confused that facebook is doing ajax!

My first entry, just a try.
HQ: http://i.imgur.com/2YeP5b6.png

Guys, to keep the timeline of the group clean, kindly create a single post for cover images. Add your images as comments. To vote, like the comment of the cover image you like. No plain-text comments.

Update: Add them to this folder https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=oa.736292163077161&type=1

Great website to show you the difference between:
Responsive, Liquid, Adaptive and static websites
posts.caption: liquidapsive.com
posts.description: Adaptive is characterized by having defined layouts for different resolutions. Responsive is characterized by having defined layouts for different resolutions.
